sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Printer, Download, ArrowLeft } from "lucide-react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const Invoice = ({ onBack }) => { const location = useLocation(); const [job, setJob] = useState(location.state || null); // Get the job data from location.state const [loading, setLoading] = useState(!job); useEffect(() => { if (!job) { setTimeout(() => { setJob({ invoiceNumber: "INV-2025-015", date: "11 Apr 2025", name: "Default Name", address: "Default Address", phone: "Default Phone", email: "default@example.com", instructions: "Default instructions", items: [ { description: "Sample Service 1", unitPrice: 100, qty: 1, total: 100 }, ], subtotal: 100, tax: 10, transport: 5, totalDue: 115, dueDate: "25 Apr 2025", }); setLoading(false); }, 1000); // Simulated loading delay for fallback data } }, [job]); if (loading) { return (
); } const handlePrint = () => { window.print(); }; return (
{/* Top Bar */}
{/* Invoice Details */}
{/* Header */}

DANIEL MOBILE DETAILING

75 Heath Road, Locks Heath,

Southampton, SO31 6BJ

Phone: 078 69 99 7211

INVOICE NO: {job.invoiceNumber}
DATE: {job.date}
{/* Client & Instructions */}

BILL TO

{job.name}

{job.address}

Phone: {job.phone || "N/A"}

Email: {job.email || "N/A"}

INSTRUCTIONS

{job.instructions || "N/A"}

{/* Items */}
{job.items.map((item, index) => ( ))}
DESCRIPTION UNIT PRICE QTY TOTAL
{item.description} £{item.unitPrice.toFixed(2)} {item.qty} £{item.total.toFixed(2)}
{/* Totals */}
SUBTOTAL £{job.subtotal.toFixed(2)}
SALES TAX £{job.tax.toFixed(2)}
TRANSPORT & HANDLING £{job.transport.toFixed(2)}
TOTAL DUE £{job.totalDue.toFixed(2)}

Thank you for your business!

); }; export default Invoice;
